description: This table contains a list of orders that have been instantiated.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of instantiated orders.

columns.name: INSTNTD_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The ID for the instantiated order, the child.  Note: For the case of the grandparent/parent/child scenario (Outpatient Standing order released into an Inpatient/HOV setting), this column will store the child (i.e. �grandchild�) order and the ORDER_ID column will store the parent order.  For the grandparent/parent order relationship, refer to STAND_HOV_INST_ORD.ORDER_ID (�grandparent�) and STAND_HOV_INST_ORD.STAND_INS_IP_ORD_ID (�parent�).
